Class Group3DAxis

java.lang.Object

          javax.media.j3d.Group
              javax.media.j3d.BranchGroup
                  healpix.plot3d.canvas3d.Group3DAxis

public class Group3DAxis
extends BranchGroup

Group3DAxis draws three 3D axes x,y,z, composed of cylinders, with cones as their 'arrow'.

Version:
$Id: Group3DAxis.java,v 1.1 2008/04/25 14:44:51 healpix Exp $
